Contact Information

Contact us by e-mail, phone, mail, or on social media.

E-mail: cgca-info@uwm.edu
Phone: 414-229-4960
Fax: 414-229-5589

Address:
Department of Physics
University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee
Kenwood Interdisciplinary Research Complex
3135 North Maryland Ave
Milwaukee, Wisconsin 53211

Faculty, staff and students contact information is available in the People section.

The Leonard E Parker Center for Gravitation, Cosmology and Astrophysics is supported by NASA, the National Science Foundation, the UW-Milwaukee College of Letters and Science, and the UW-Milwaukee Graduate School.
